DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of a therapeutic DNA vaccine in adults with symptomatic herpes simplex virus type 2 (i.e., genital herpes).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy Study of Herpes Simplex Virus Type 2 (HSV-2) Therapeutic DNA Vaccine
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate the safety and efficacy of 4 doses of VCL-HB01, a therapeutic HSV plasmid DNA vaccine formulated with VaxfectinÂ® in HSV-2-seropositive adults with a reported history of symptomatic genital herpes for at least one year.
DOC.criteria: HSV2 seropositive A minimum of 1 year of reported history of genital herpes with recurrences. History of receiving an investigational HSV vaccine Chronic illness for which a subject's immune system is suspected to be impaired or altered, such as cancer, autoimmune conditions, or diabetes Pregnant or breastfeeding
